'''''J.R.R. Tolkien's The Lord of the Rings Coloring Book''''' is a [[1978]] activity book intended for children, based on [[Ralph Bakshi]]'s ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.amazon.com/Lord-Rings-Coloring-Book/dp/B000GLPGIO/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1325786776&sr=1-1|articlename=The Lord of the Rings Coloring Book|dated=|website=AM|accessed=9 January 2012}}</ref>
